original_title: Jillian Michaels The Biggest Winner! Workout 2, Shape Up - Backside
overview: Shape Up - Backside features Jillian Michaels, trainer to the stars, as she puts you on the fast track to toning up and losing weight.  In this amazing fat-burning second-volume, Jillian works the back, biceps, glutes, hamstrings, and abs.  As always, Jillian keeps the whole program aerobic - for the ultimate in weight-loss results.  Join Jillian Michaels, TV's toughest fitness guru, for the best and most comprehensive workout regimen available on DVD.  Now let's get started...
title: Jillian Michaels The Biggest Winner! Workout 2, Shape Up - Backside
